17218.「おお <pc>か！ よく来てくれた。\n ヒメア様が そなたと\n アカシを:
Oh <pc>! You have come well. Himea-
sama is calling for you and Akashi.

17219.「ちょうど アカシも来たようだな。\n さあ ふたりとも 入るがよい。:
It seems Akashi has just arrived as well. Come
on, you two, let's go in.

17220.「<pc> そして アカシ……。\n よくぞ 来てくれました。:
<pc> And Akashi... thank you for
coming.

17221.「……そなたたちと 別れたあとで\n 私も すこし 考えてみたのです。:
After I left you, I thought about it a little
more.

17222.「コハクが あのようなことにならなければ\n 私たちは ３００年前に\n ふたり:
We would have had our own private nuptials 300
years ago if Kohaku hadn't had to go through
what he did.

17223.「もしも そなたたちの言うとおり\n コハクが その約束を 覚えているのなら……:
If you are right and Kohaku remembers that
promise...

17224.「コハクは 私たちが 誓いの盃を\n 交わすはずだった 約束の地……\n 世界樹:
Kohaku may have gone to the promised land
where we were supposed to exchange our Oath
Cups...Yggdrahill.

17225.「そなたたちの 言葉を信じて\n 私は 世界樹の丘へ 行きましょう。:
I believe in your words and I will go to
Yggdrahill.

17226.「<pc>。アカシ。そなたたちも\n ともに 世界樹の丘に 行ってくれますか？\:
<pc>. Akashi. Will you go with us to
Yggdrahill? I want you to see where we are
going.

17227.「<pc>さんが 行くなら\n あたしも行きます！: If <pc> is going, I'm going too!

17229.「世界樹の丘は この村の 東にある\n 久遠の森を抜けた先です。\n すぐに 出:
Yggdrahill is just east of this village, past
the Forest of Eternity. We should leave
immediately.

17230.「私は 先に 世界樹の丘へ向かいます。\n そなたたちも 準備ができたら\n す:
I will go to Yggdrahill first. Please come as
soon as you are ready.

17231.「礼を言います <pc>。\n ……しかし そなたのことを\n 多くの者が 必要:
I thank you <pc>. ...but it seems you
are needed by many.

17232.「ならば そなたは その者たちの所へ\n 行くべきでしょう。わざわざ 呼び立てて:
Then you should go to them. I'm sorry I went
to the trouble of calling you out.

17233.「……そうですか。\n 残念ですが そなたが そう言うのなら\n あきらめるほか:
I see. I'm sorry, but if you insist, I have no
choice but to give up.

17234.「まあ…… ふたりとも\n 戻ってきてくれたのですね。: Well... both of you came back.

17235.「私は コハクが いることを信じ\n これより 世界樹の丘へ 行くつもりです。\:
I am going to Yggdrahill now, believing that
Kohaku is there. That place is the promised
land of Kohaku.

17236.「<pc>……アカシ。そなたたちも\n ともに 世界樹の丘に 行ってくれますか？:
<pc>...Akashi. Will you go with us to
Yggdrahill? I want you to see where we are
going.

17238.「……思えば そなたと最初に出会ったのも \n この丘であったな。: It was on this hill that I first met you.

17239.「あれから ３００年…… \n 時が流れ 世が移ろいゆく中で\n 私と そなたの:
Three hundred years have passed since then...
and while the world has moved on, time has
stood still only for you and me.

17240.「そのことが 不幸なのかどうかさえ\n 今の私には もはや わからぬ。\n ただ:
I don't even know if that is unfortunate or
not anymore. It's just...

17241.「永遠に思えた我が命も まもなく尽きるようだ。\n この世界樹が 花をつけようと:
My life, which seemed eternal, will soon run
out. This Yggdrasil is about to blossom.

17242.「数百年に一度咲く 世界樹の花……。\n 花が咲くのを見届ければ 我が役割は終わ:
Yggdrasil Flower blooms once every few hundred
years... and once I see it bloom, my role will
be complete.

17243.「未練はない。我が身が 朽ちるのならば\n これもまた さだめ……。\n 私は:
I have no regrets. If I am to decay, this too
shall pass, and I will do what I must before
then.

17245.「その獣を殺されては 困りますよ ヒメア様。\n 私の貴重な 研究材料でしてね。:
I cannot allow you to kill that beast, Himea-
sama. It's valuable material for my research.

17246.「きさま……まだ 不老の術を欲するか……。: You... still desire the art of immortality...

17247.「永遠の命は 生きとし生ける者の\n 共通の夢でしょう？ いかなるリスクがあろう:
Eternal life is the common dream of all living
things, isn't it? Worth the risk, no matter
what the cost... Hmm?

17253.「なぜ 戻ってきた <cs_pchero>！\n 今のコハクは 怒りで 我を忘れ:
Why did you come back? Kohaku is so angry,
he's lost his mind! Quickly, get out of here!

17261.「そなたは 私に……人としての幸福と\n 生きることの意味を 教えてくれた。:
You have taught me the happiness of humanity
and the meaning of life.

17262.「代わりに 私は そなたに\n なにを与えられただろう？\n すべてを奪い ３０:
What could I have given you in exchange? You
took everything I had and put me in chains for
300 years.

17263.「長い間 苦しめて すまなかった。\n せめて今 我が手で 黄泉へと送ろう。:
I'm sorry for causing you so much pain. At
least now I can send you to Deliverance with
my own hands.

17265.「そなたは この丘で 婚礼の儀を行う約束を\n 忘れずにいてくれたのだな……。:
You have remembered your promise to perform
the marriage ceremony on this hill...

17266.「今 そなたとの約束を 果たそう。: Now I will fulfill my promise to you.

17267.「風よ。この盃に 清めの酒を。: O wind. In this cup is Purifying Sake.

17269.「さあ コハク。これで我らも夫婦になれた。: Come on, Kohaku. Now we are husband and wife.

17270.「ともに生きることが かなわぬのなら\n せめて ともに この世を去ろう。:
If we cannot live together, let us at least
leave this world together.

17271.「私が死のうとも 世界樹は じきに花をつける。\n この程度の自由は 許されるだ:
Even in my death, the Yggdrasil will soon
blossom. This freedom will be granted to me...
it is the least I can do.

17272.「ヒメア様！！\n そんな…… やめてください！！: Lady Himea! Oh, no... Please don't!

17273.「お 男の決意を バカにすんじゃねえ！！: Don't you dare mock a man's resolve!

17274.「あの ラブレターにはなあ！\n 男の一生分の すんげー覚悟が つまってんだ。\:
That love letter! That love letter is filled
with a man's super determination for the rest
of his life. You're trampling on it!

17276.「そうですよ……！ コハクさんは\n こんな…… ヒック……つぐないなんて\n:
That's right...! There's no way Kohaku-san
would want such a...hiccup...!

17277.「死んじゃうなんて やめてください。\n ヒメア様 お願いです……。\n ぜった:
Please don't let me die. Himea-sama, please...
please don't do this... please don't do
this...

17279.「ヒ ヒメア様が いなくなったら……\n うっ うっ……。ひっく。:
If Lady Himea goes away...
*sob, sob* *hic*

17280.「師は 教えることよりも\n 教えられることのほうが多いと言うが……\n 本当に:
They say a teacher has more to teach than he
has to teach... perhaps that is indeed true.

17281.「学びの庭を作り 子供たちに\n 学問の道を開こうと言ったのは\n コハクだった:
It was Kohaku who suggested that we create a
garden of learning and open a path of learning
for our children...

17283.「ともに生きることは かなわなかったが……\n ここに 我らの子供たちがいるのだ:
We could not live together, but here are our
children.

17285.「ツスクルの村へ 帰りましょう。\n 私は 世界樹の守り手であり\n そなたたち:
Let us return to Tsuskuru Village. I am the
guardian of the Yggdrasil and the mother who
guides you students.

17286.「皆 後で 私の屋敷へ来てください。: Everyone come to my mansion later.

17287.「やれやれ……。私は おいとましますよ。\n あんな 不完全な禁術など\n 私の:
Well, well... I'll leave you to it. Such
imperfect forbidden arts do not suit my sense
of beauty.

17288.「よく 来てくれましたね。: Thank you very much for coming.

17289.「そなたたちへの 感謝の気持ちとしては\n これでは 足りないかもしれませんが…:
This may not be enough to express my gratitude
to you, but please accept it as a token of my
appreciation.

17290.「……この館からは 学びの庭の様子が\n とても よく見えるのです。:
...From this pavilion, you can see the garden
of learning very clearly.

17291.「走り回る子…… 転んで泣く子。\n 木陰で 本を読む子。\n 食べてばかりいる:
A child running... A child falling down and
crying. A child reading a book under a tree.
A child eating all the time...

17292.「皆 私と コハクの子なのだと思った途端\n この世を去ることが 悲しくなりまし:
As soon as I realized that they were all mine
and Kohaku's, I was sad to see them go.

17293.「この残された命は 学徒たちのために\n 使うことにしましょう。\n 最期まで:
I will use my remaining life for the sake of
the students. I will be with you until my last
breath.

17294.「コハクには もうしばらく\n 黄泉の入り口で 待っていてもらいましょう。\n:
Let Kohaku wait at the entrance of Hades for a
while longer. I am sure... he will forgive us.
